mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender, nickname, message, message_type, sent_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{sender}, #{nickname}, #{message}, #{type}, #{sentAt})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id as messageId, room_id as roomId, sender, message, message_type as type, sent_at as sentAt FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
